moves.1. Nf3: Thought I'd start out a little bit different as to my usual.
moves.2. d4 Nf6 3. Nc3 d6 4. e4: Trying to gain a key hold of the middle.
moves.4... Bg4 5. Be2 e6 6. e5 Nfd7 7. Bc4 Bxf: Bring my queen into play instead of doubling up of pawns.
moves.8... dxe5 9. d5 Qf6 10. dxe6 Qxf3 11. gx: Don't like doubling up my pawns but had no choice at this point.
moves.14. bxc3 Ke7 15. Bxd7 Nxd7 16. Ba3+ c5 1: Wanted to get both rooks into play.
moves.22. Re7 gxh4 23. Rdxd7+ Kc6 24. Bb2: Trying to attack his rook on h8.
moves.24... Rag8+ 25. Kf1 h3 26. c4 h2 27. Bxh: I personally would have taken the bishop and upgraded pawn next move. Major mistake on his behalf as the bishop ends up winning the game for me.
moves.28. Ke2 Rg6: Don't know what this move was about?!
